about_the_game:
The Bakerville Case is inspired by the true events of the secret 1950s "MK Ultra" program, to build a haunting and mysterious story that can be complemented as the player explores the playable environments.

You are Thomas Baker, a journalist who, after being contacted by an anonymous source, travels to a town to investigate a series of horrifying unknown events.

In a town located in North America called Bakerville, terror and evil wait to be found. According to the anonymous source, an unknown group is performing horrifying experiments on the people of the town, and the center point of all of it seems to be a nearby psychiatric hospital.

Thomas arrives in Bakerville to discover the terrifying mystery at the heart of the town, but he was never going to imagine what he would find in that place.

The Bakerville Case combines elements of survival horror, psychological horror, exploration, and mystery.
Discover the mystery of this narrative adventure as you survive in Bakerville the fears that await there.

Get multiple weapons to fight and survive.

Administrate your resources to get out of multiple situations.

Survive as you can: Run, fight or hide.

Use your ingenuity and pay attention to the environment and the situation that where you are to keep forward.

Choose between the 4 difficulties: Normal, Hard, Survivor and Nightmare.

Here are additional details of The Bakerville Case:

  • Realistic and modern graphics.

  • Immersive visual and ambient effects.

  • Realistic and detailed environments.

  • Totally original music and sound composed by Felipe Miño and Piero Ocaña.

  • Dark and suspenseful story.

  • Narrative background that the player can discover.

  • Explorable semi-open environments.

  • Average story duration of 3 hours.

  • Multiple weapons, tools and items.

  • Over 35 useful items, including resources, consumables, ammo types, and weapons.

  • Multiple enemy types.

  • Inventory crafting system.

  • Variety of game mechanics.

  • Unlockable upgrades system.

  • Save system between chapters.

  • Explore Bakerville and discover its secrets and you might find something useful for you.

  • Customizable controls.


TECHNICAL FEATURES

The Bakerville Case includes the following technical features:

  • HDR available and up to 4K resolution.

  • Ultrawide monitors support.

  • No FPS limit by default.

  • Real-time rendered graphics and lighting.

  • Multithread Rendering support.

  • Variety of graphic settings such a textures, shadows, lighting, post-processing, particles, anti-aliasing and much more.

  • Immersive visuals created with AURA 2 technology, which allows volumetric elements and a more realistic environment.

  • Envira Enhance is our advanced graphics system powered by DirectX, enabling Real-Time Global Illumination and enhanced shadows using Ray-Tracing, as well as high-fideliy volumetric lighting.

  • Immersive particle system that adds environment interaction and dynamic physics to elements like fog and smoke.

  • NVIDIA Reflex support or better input response.

  • Support for FidelityFX Super Resolution 2.2, which is a technology developed by AMD to increase the number of frames per second when playing by using image scaling techniques.

  • Support for FidelityFX Super Resolution 3, which uses artificial intelligence to improve performance by running the game at a lower internal resolution and then scaling the image, thereby increasing the frames per second.

  • For an immersive audio experience, we recommend Dolby Atmos or DTS Surround sound systems.

ABOUT ENVIRA ENHANCE

  • Envira Enhance is our advanced graphics system powered by DirectX, enabling Real-Time Global Illumination and enhanced shadows using Ray Tracing, as well as high-fidelity volumetric lighting.

  • High-quality volumetric lighting generated with Quantum Volumetrics, part of the Envira Enhance ecosystem.

  • Pulse Illumination is our ray tracing system that does not depend on RTX cores, and is composed of multiple functionalities such as Real-Time Global Illumination, which improves the behavior of lighting in the elements of the environment, as well as the reaction of objects, adding light bounces and transluminescence to certain materials and textures. Shadows also improve its behavior, such that it changes its rendering depending on its distance from a light source, this is possible thanks to our ShadingWorks system, which improves the shadows quality.


STEAM FEATURES

The Bakerville Case has integration and compatibility with the following Steam features.

  • Steam Cloud: Steam will automatically save your progress, so you can resume your game from another computer.

  • Achievements: Earn achievements by completing specific actions in the game.

For more information about advanced graphics quality and ray-tracing requirements, visit our website.

The Bakerville Case is a game created by one person. Please give your feedback and report any bugs to us, this will really help speed up development progress! Thank you very much.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 560 / GTX 1650 • 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Graphic settings: Low, Textures Resolution: Low. 1080p, 30 FPS, FSR in Quality mode. (Please see our requirements table for more details) Reflex requires an NVIDIA GPU to run. Multithread Rendering requires a processor with support for this function.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6600 / RTX 2080 • 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Graphic settings: High - Ultra, Textures Resolution: High. 1440p, +60 FPS, FSR in Performance mode. (Please see our requirements table for more details) Reflex requires an NVIDIA GPU to run. Multithread Rendering requires a processor with support for it. Optional SSD. We recommend an internet connection for Steam Cloud functionality.

short_description: Get ready for a first-person horror, adventure and survival experience, enter the darkness in this adventure inspired by true events and enjoy incredible graphics generated in real time with Unity engine. Play as Thomas Baker and explore Bakerville to discover the terrible evil that resides there.
